metadata.title: CVE-2016-1521 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The directrun function in directmachine.cpp in Libgraphite in Graphite 21.2.4, as used in Mozilla Firefox before 43.0 and Firefox ESR 38.x before38.6.1, does not validate a certain skip operation, which allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code, obtain sensitive information, or causea denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via acrafted Graphite smart font.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1521` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgraphite2-3 - 1.2.4-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphite2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.4-1ubuntu1.1').
